profile.name: Faisal Muhammad
profile.summary: Former Content Writer with 1 year of experience working in the technology industry and non-governmental organizations. Successfully authored 90+ fundraising campaigns that collectively raised over Rp1.800.000.000+ as a Content Writer for the Insan Bumi Mandiri Foundation. Recently attended a digital marketing bootcamp for 3 months to learn digital marketing in more depth. Skilled in content writing/copywriting, SEO, and digital marketing.

responsibilities: Wrote 90+ fundraising campaigns that were published on Insan Bumi Mandiri’s website with total donations reaching Rp1.800.000.000+.
Wrote 15+ press releases about the achievements and activities of Insan Bumi Mandiri with the goal of promoting it.
Wrote 30+ blog articles on a variety of topics including health, community empowerment and tourism.
Created 80+ Instagram and TikTok contents in form of feed, carousel, or reel.
Wrote 40+ blog articles on a wide variety of topics linked to productivity.
Wrote 10+ Twitter threads on a wide variety of topics linked to productivity.
Create monthly content plans for Instagram, Twitter and blog articles.
Contributed in DoZine (DoCheck’s monthly magazine) releases as a writer.
Wrote 5+ scripts for FlyOver (afternoon) broadcast program that align with advertiser’s product yet entertaining, easy to listen, and insightful.
Successfully gathered 70+ respondents while conducting a telesurvey about radio listener trends and advertiser products.
Wrote news and traffic report scripts that are read periodically during broadcast by the broadcaster.
Made a list of interesting questions for upcoming guest interviews.
Made research plans based on the research subject profile.
Collected data related to the LIPI’s bio-toilet project at Babakan Sinyar Public Elementary School.
Analyzed the data regarding the bio-toilet project that has been collected.
Presented the analyzed data in front of LIPI’s researchers.

project.name: I-POD
responsibilities: Managed to make I-Pod available on several digital streaming platforms, including Spotify.
Managed to adapt with COVID-19 pandemic situation.

project.name: Ilkom Mengajar II
responsibilities: Formulated topic, concept, and learning method based on target participants.
Managed to deliver learning materials about bullying in a way that was fun and understood by elementary school students as participants.
Managed to make students engaged and actively participated during learning sessions.

organization.name: Communication Science Student Association of Padjadjaran University
responsibilities: Created digital content and all Communication Science Student Association of Padjadjaran University’s publication needs, such as Instagram post graphics and captions, podcasts, infographics, and managing social media.
Participated in the creation of Yellowgami (Communication Science Student Association of Padjadjaran University’s annual newsletter) as a layouter.

organization.name: Communication Science Student Association of Padjadjaran University
responsibilities: Maintained good relationships with the surrounding community through the Communication Science Student Association of Padjadjaran University’s work program.
Raised funds for victims and affected people when a natural disaster occurs.
